name: Lovely Guard
effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 100% for all allies for 3 turns
Increase DEF and SPR by 40% for 3 turns to all allies

name: Lovely Guard
可愛守護
러블리 가드
Belle protection
Liebliche Wache
Guardia encantadora
desc_short: Boost poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance, and DEF and SPR for all allies
提高全體隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的耐性+提高防禦精神的數值
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승+방어력과 정신력 상승
Augmente la rés. à pois., céc., som., sil, para., conf., mala., pétri. et DEF/PSY pour tous les alliés
Erhöhte Resistenz gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, erhöht ABW und PSY.
Aumenta la DEF, ESP y res. a ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie
desc_long: Boosts poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance, and DEF and SPR for all allies.
提高全體隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的耐性，同時提高防禦精神的數值。
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승하고, 방어력과 정신력이 상승합니다.
Augmente la rés. à pois., céc., som., sil, para., conf., mala., pétri. et DEF/PSY pour tous les alliés
Erhöhte Resistenz gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, erhöht ABW und PSY.
Aumenta la DEF, el ESP y la resistencia a veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra.
